alert.note: Alert for Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 11:52PM CDT until July 15 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Grant County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Saline County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1152 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lonoke to near Sweet Home to Geyer Springs, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Pine Bluff... Sheridan... Southwest Little Rock... White Hall... Shannon Hills... England... Wrightsville... Redfield... Altheimer... Keo... Otter Creek... Cane Creek... Ironton... Estes... Toltec Mounds State Park... East End... Orion... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
